title: Python Code Completion Exercises with GitHub Copilot

steps.description:
## Welcome to the Python Code Completion Exercises with GitHub Copilot!

In this tour, you will learn how to use GitHub Copilot to complete partial implementations, write guiding code, and explore different implementation variations for common algorithms. Follow the steps and guidelines to get the most out of this experience.

1. Use the "Edit with Copilot" feature on the right.
2. Add the you would like to edit if not already present.
3. Write the following prompt in the chat section of  Edit with Copilot: "Complete functions in this file."
4. Observe and review the suggestions provided by Copilot.
5. Select the most appropriate completion or modify it as needed.
